tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE in_app_purchases (
    purchase_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE in_app_purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE currency_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    purchase_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES virtual_currency(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (purchase_id) REFERENCES in_app_purchases(purchase_id)
);

CREATE TABLE in_app_purchases (
    purchase_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE currency_transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE user_wallet (
    wallet_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    wallet_balance DECIMAL(10, 2),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date DATE,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES app_users(user_id),
    currency_id INT REFERENCES virtual_currency(currency_id),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
